```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(wesanderson)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#readin Data
cost_gas_data<- read_csv("assign_3_data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(q_aggregate = sum(q_low_gallons + q_high_gallons))

```
```{r}
# Linear Regression Low Cost Consumer 
lm_low <- lm(price_dollars ~ q_low_gallons, data=cost_gas_data) 
print(lm_low)  #  11.69 + -6.611X10^-05
# Linear Regression High Cost Consumer
lm_high <- lm(price_dollars ~ q_high_gallons, data=cost_gas_data) 
print(lm_high)  #  1.580 x 10^1 + -2.731X10^-05

```
